name: Ex Temperus
description:
In Ex Temperus, you built a time machine to travel to different eras and locations, but it has gone out of control! The shards of your time pyramid have been scattered around the world's timeline, and it is up to you to collect them and put them together. However, a curse has been cast upon you by the Time Guardian!

Make towers and totems to fight his soldiers, combat them, as they will hunt you down and destroy your machine.

Travel through time, beat the Guardian, and try to get back to the present!

Created in 7 days time by a group of 5 people for the Epic Megajam 2020. Team name: "Timeless Horde"

- Stefan Geerinckx: Environment Artist, Level Designer, UI Artist, Programmer
- Samuli Kinnunen: Concept Artist, VFX Artist, Animator
- Jani Saarelainen: Character Artist
- Michael Verdian: Lead Programmer
- Magabes: Voice Actor, Music Composer, Sound Designer
